text: Hagi havi anumzante'ma mono'ma huntesaza kumatamina, Hinomu agupofi Tofetiema nehaza kumate trohuntete'za anante ne'mofa'zmia zamahe'za tevefina kre tasage'za havi anumzantera ofa hu'naze. E'inahu avu'ava zama hu'nazana Nagri antahi'zampina omanegeno, Nagra ana hiho hu'na huozamante'noa avu'ava'za tro hu'naze.
